summary:
A married couple who are also Veterans were also VA employees. One worked at one CBOC, and the other worked at a nearby CBOC. The wife was killed in a 
fluke accident off duty. Employees accessed the husband's record in order to gain his home address to mail condolence cards and collections taken up at all of 
the facility's CBOCs. All employees that had accessed the record did state the purpose of going into the record was to gain the address as this was a young 
couple with two very small children and several collections were taken up for the family.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
